title: Unity in the Body of Christ
itunes:title: Unity in the Body of Christ
description:
God wants to use us to bring healing and revival to our world. Let’s come together as the church to lift up our communities. Where there is unity and peace, there is power and blessing.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
